channel.title: Comments on: Vodafone to launch open source community portal called Betavine

item.title: By: Vodafone Betavine and flat rate data tariffs?
item.dc:creator: Vodafone Betavine and flat rate data tariffs?
item.description: [...] My recent post about the imminent soft launch of Vodafoneâ€™s new community Portal has attracted a lot of attention across the blogshere and traditional news sites, demonstrating the power of the blog to anyone who might be a little sceptical. Although, truth be told, if it wasnâ€™t for people like Richard at ReadWrite/Web and Sam/Mike at Vecosys I doubt I would have seen a fraction of the traffic and Vodafone wouldnâ€™t be as concerned about the latest speculation to grab the grape vine. I suppose my post on Web2Ireland would have stimulated some interest also. [...]

item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description:
Great Paul, thanks.
Why don't you include a link to the contact form on my blog so people can sign up now to help with some testing and to get their own apps up before anyone else.
item.content:encoded:
Great Paul, thanks.

Why don’t you include a link to the contact form on my blog so people can sign up now to help with some testing and to get their own apps up before anyone else.

item.title: By: Paul M. Watson
item.dc:creator: Paul M. Watson
item.description:
I've linked to this on doingtherightthing.com: http://dotherightthing.com/entries/130
Interesting idea and I hope it works.
item.content:encoded:
I’ve linked to this on doingtherightthing.com: http://dotherightthing.com/entries/130

Interesting idea and I hope it works.

item.title: By: Paul Walsh
item.dc:creator: Paul Walsh
item.description: It's amazing what you can achieve when you hit the plublish key! I've published the post on my own blog in case you noticed it wasn't up there.
item.content:encoded: It’s amazing what you can achieve when you hit the plublish key! I’ve published the post on my own blog in case you noticed it wasn’t up there.
